text: Bahadır Nahit Yenişehirlioğlu (born January 18, 1962, Manisa) is a Turkish actor, politician, lawyer and writer. He is a member of the Manisa parliament in the 28th term. Yenişehirlioğlu is a member of the Justice and Development Party (AK Parti). He mostly writes novels. He is also a lawyer; He graduated from Dokuz Eylül University, Faculty of Law. He gained fame as an actorwith the character Tahsin Pasha. He played the character for 5 seasons on the television series Payitaht Abdülhamid between 2017 and 2021. Yenişehirlioğlu plays the character of Derviş on the series Barbaroslar: Sword of the Mediterranean between 2021 and 2022. He became the Manisa parliamentary candidate from the AK Party in the 2023 Turkish general election and was elected. == Written works == * Desert of Love (2014) * White Master Black Apprentice (2017) * Love Front (2017) * Cross Stitch (2017) * Black Sun (2017) * Kareem (2017) * The Wooden Horse (2017) * Last Harvest (2018) * Hunkar me * Antique dealer * Then Love Wears Her Clothes * Hanna (2020) == Acting roles == Movies year Production Role 2018 Hürkuş: Hero in the Sky Colonel Ratip 2018 Karatay Resistance Alpdogan Television series year Production Role 2014 Seven Beautiful Men Sahaf Ismail Efendi 2016 Love is on the Wings of Birds Hosni 2017-2021 Payitaht: Abdülhamid Tahsin Pasha 2020 Story from Mesnevi Presenter 2021-2022 Barbarossa: Sword of the Mediterranean Dervish Hussein 2022-2023 Barbaros Hayreddin: Decree of the Sultan == Personal life == Bahadır Yenişehirlioğlu is married and has two children. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish actors Category:Turkish writers Category:Turkish politicians
title: Bahadır Yenişehirlioğlu
